titles.title: To establish defiance of a congressional subpoena for testimony or documents by the President as an impeachable high crimes and misdemeanor within the meaning of Article II, Section 4 of the United States Constitution.

To establish defiance of a congressional subpoena for testimony or documents by the President as an impeachable high crimes and misdemeanor within the meaning of Article II, Section 4 of the United States Constitution.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents
